data.title: Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf → Dresden Hbf by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf to Dresden Hbf in 2h 19m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf to Dresden Hbf today.
data.text:
Want to find out more about taking the train from Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf to Dresden Hbf? Look no further.

There are around 24 trains per day running between Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf and Dresden Hbf, which usually take 3 hours 1 minute to complete the 107 miles (172 km) journey. It can take as little as 2 hours 19 minutes on the fastest services though, if you want to get there as quickly as possible. Although there aren't any direct services on this line, it's still easy to travel to Dresden Hbf from Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf, you'll just need to make 1 change along the way.

You can save money on train tickets from Berlin-Pankow-Heinersdorf to Dresden Hbf if you book in advance. Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.

Want to book your train tickets now? Just start a search with us today. If you want to find out more about the journey, read on for timetables (including first and last train times), FAQs and tips on how to book cheap train tickets.
